name: Neeharika
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May all the joy you have spread around come back to you a hundredfold ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you Neeharika!! Yee!! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very Special for me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or reload the page, if you want to watch it again.
